resources.string: Tap Here For a Random Fun Fact
I love animals, even the ones most are afraid of.
I have a lot of pets. Including a cat and several reptiles.
My first programming language I learned was C. I taught myself with an O\'Reilly book and a Raspberry Pi 3!
I was the president of the Stitch to Enrich and ReptiClub at UTD.
Hello %1$s! \nI didn\'t know I had such a cool neighbor!
I would love to work with you! Thank you for this opportunity.\nYour neighbor, %1$s
